mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user_info(user_email, user_pwd, user_name, user_id) VALUES(#{user_email}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTCNT FROM tbl_user_info LEFT JOIN TBL_ADAPTATION ON tbl_user_info.user_id = TBL_ADAPTATION.user_id WHERE TBL_ADAPTATION.user_id = #{user_id};
